::Magmatron::

    He noticed a powerful bots signature, and amazingly it w=
as Destron. (Galvatron) He sent a comm encoded only to the Destron signal, =
nobody else could decode it, and if they did, it would come out in gibberin=
g incohearent words.
    The message went like this. "Attention all Destron=
s. Please return to LV-426. We have important matters to discuss, they conc=
ern the very fate of our faction in these Beast Wars."
    Magmatron had al=
so recently awakened the sleeping bot in the lab. He sent a worker drone to=
 the lab to do some testing....
